","sentences":"...a Russian-American joint venture.
^^…一个俄美合资的风险项目。^^

","relWords":"adj.

vi.

","synos":"vt.

n.

","sentences":"the feudal lords

"},"$:/PEPGaoZhong_10/friction_112":{"title":"$:/PEPGaoZhong_10/friction_112","word":"friction","tags":"?","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-PEPGaoZhong_10/Word}}","created":"20220403104545682","transCn":"n. 矛盾，冲突；摩擦

","sentences":"the usual frictions between parents and their teenage children.

Check your rope frequently, as friction against the rock can wear it away.

","relWords":"adj.
